website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Predator X34 is a huge curved display with lots of gamer-friendly features and excellent performance in our tests. It's our top pick for big-screen, ultra-wide gaming monitors.

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor more than my wife
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor more than my wife,in fact she may have already left me and i just haven't noticed.
customer_reviews.author: daio

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Ultrawide monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor somewhat hesitantly as I'd heard some worrying reports about the original quality of the x34. I needn't have worried however as the unit I received is superb, zero dead or stuck pixels, 100hz no problem, no coil whine and virtually no backlight bleed, really very VERY good.
customer_reviews.author: PluckyBrit

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor - Shame I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for all round use, especially gaming. Sadly after two weeks mine stopped working properly over HDMI, turning itself off and back on as if the cable had been disconnected. I tried different cables and even displayport to hdmi converters. Because of how good the monitor is, I could almost overlook it if I didn't need to use both the HDMI port and Displayport (I have two machines connected to the monitor). I shouldn't have to though, not at this money. If you get a good one, you won't be disappointed, but this really is a dice roll, and that isn't OK for a monitor which costs the best part of a grand.
customer_reviews.author: jmp esp

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Monitor - 21:9 AND 100Hz.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning monitor that enhances your gaming experience and provides plenty of space when working. Build quality is excellent, very sturdy metal base. No dead pixels. Couple this with the overclock feature that allows you to run at 100Hz - this is a superb bit of kit. Comes packaged in a very large box - you may need a hand getting it up a flight of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: N Stewart

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MONITOR! :D
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor. The best I've owned and I have been through A LOT! G Sync is a Godsend. No more tearing! It's a game changer. No pixel issues unlike the dozens of returns I've had to organise from poor QC by other manufacturers (Asus, Dell). Effortlessly overclocks to 100Hz on my rig. i7 2011-3, Asus MoBo, STRIX 1080 Ti. The only issue I have found is an ever so slight coil whine buzz when overclocking the monitor and viewing a predominantly white screen (ie, Chrome). However if you're sitting a couple of ft away or have normal human hearing you're unlikely to notice it at all. I won't be upgrading this beast for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Gopal B.

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading the reviews! BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the XB270HU, the X34A is a really good monitor upgrade. I honestly doubt anything can top this within 5 years! Zero pixel problems. Some backlight bleed / IPS Glow 95hz :/ Apart from that, a perfect monitor for all uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ecstasy

customer_reviews.title: Stunning rendition
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular monitor...worth every penny. With a 1080 running at stock clocks I get high fps in all games at the max resolution this monitor supports. Battlefield, battlefront, doom, prey, all in glorious 100fps wide screen large ultra rendition. My only niggle is that the black surround does look plastic which reduces the aesthetics of this premium monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Had to knock a star off as within the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to knock a star off as within the first month the screen developed a line of dead pixels. Contacted Acer and had it sent back to them, they returned it the next day fully repaired. Not had any further problems with it since and it has been used regularly. Acer customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I will ever own, the one on the right
customer_reviews.text: I have had this awesome monitor for nearly a year. This is a game changer, it makes games more fun, 1440p makes it clear, 100hz with g-sync makes it smooth. It is extremely expensive but I found it worth every penny. To run this beast set up in maxed out ultra settings, my rig has a rog strix 1080, i5 6600k ,16gb of corsair vengeance ram on a z170i motherboard.
customer_reviews.author: tobias

customer_reviews.title: It’s hardly cheap but as a gaming monitor it’s great. Maxes at 100hz if that worries you and ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s hardly cheap but as a gaming monitor it’s great. Maxes at 100hz if that worries you and initially it did make some noises but they stopped after a few weeks. Also works well as a general monitor, and I can read two documents side by side given the size and aspect ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: 34 inches of pure, unadulterated, curved glory
customer_reviews.text: Aftery first month of having the monitor I can honestly say it was the best investment I have made for my eyes sake period. Wether content creating or sprawling a vast landscape in a video game at 3440x1440 the dial gets cranked up from 10 to freaking 12 and puts my 1080p monitor to absolute shame. This thing is aggressive and powerful and deals as the ultimate vessel for a gamers experience to carve their path through whichever landscape they will explore. Well until 2018 when the X35 takes centre stage.
customer_reviews.author: Lawson_J

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can handle it.
customer_reviews.text: If you have the kind of money for this monitor before thinking about buying it, think... can i game at 1440p Ultra wide at 100fps. If the answer is yes then get this asap if no then simple just get a standard 1440p Monitor or get a 1440p 144hz one.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Wall mounted beauty!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This ultrawide monitor is the business... whatever you throw at it... gaming, work, streaming etc Brilliant... Plus I wall mounted it :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Superb quality, image is crisp. I have it 80 cm off my face and its still large. I wouldn't go larger than that. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: The best gaming monitor that I've ever used. Period. an IPS panel with 100 HZ refresh rate and QHD resolution. You will not find a better ultra wide monitor in the market right now, even a year after its release

customer_reviews.text: little black bleed, ootb sound is pretty bad. once plugged to a proper 2.1, it's awesome. image quality is top notch, response is near instant, highly recommend!

customer_reviews.author: Dimitrie Lucian Mosor

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: quality monitor, bit pricey but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: UltimateNinja82

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: In perfect condition fantastic picture, couldn't be happier having bought this via Amazon warehouse, it arrived damage free as though I had bought it brand new Highly recommended Below is an updated review Goes without saying excellent monitor, however default Brightness and Contrast settings are off A simple solution is google brightness test pattern and adjust accordingly until bars (17-25) are flashing 16 and below should not, search for contrast test pattern again adjust accordingly until bars (230-234) are flashing My settings from default below Brightness (black level) 19 Contrast (white level) 51/52 Definitely made a massive improvement on the immersion aspect Hope this helps othe buyers Satisfied consumer
customer_reviews.author: adrianlh

customer_reviews.title: Wide!
customer_reviews.text: Never been more satisfied with a monitor, went from the Acer xb280hk a 4K 60hz G-Sync to this panel as I wanted ultrawide and a decent 100hz refresh. Hugely impressed, hitting the higher framerates is easier at 1440p and the games barely look that different, the 100hz is lovely and smooth with G-Sync as well. It really drags you into the action from racing games like F1 2016 to shooters like PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds. This is the current king.
customer_reviews.author: Drusus

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive monitor... i used a Benq ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive monitor...i used a Benq XL2430T 24 inch 144Hz before and the difference is huge, cause of the gsync capability it really makes the games move a lot more smoth.
customer_reviews.author: Ciprian

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, seeing is believing.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to see from the pictures but this monitor is huge, Ultrawide is incredible which added to the high refresh rate makes for a very pleasant productivity and gaming environment. You don't have to fullscreen apps, you can literally fit 5-6 apps open in windows and they are perfectly readable and usable. Really impressed by the colour and responsiveness especially with G-Sync turned on making games incredibly immersive whilst being easier on your hardware than 4k. If you have the cash this monitor is well worth the spend.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Schatynski

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great display, took the plunge after a little consideration. Mine, which was manufactured in November 2016, has little back light bleed and no dead pixels, OC'd to 100Hz easily. Only got it today but is so far fantastic, worlds apart from a standard 16:9.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Creese

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few months and overall has been a great upgrade from my 1080P monitor
customer_reviews.text: Have had this monitor for a few months and overall has been a great upgrade from my 1080P monitor. Mainly the aspect ratio has been great which allows better immersion in games. Using multiple windows is also great for productivity. Gsync and 100hz are also nice but didnt find them that amazing! Maybe if i went back to non Gsynce and 60hz I would notice this more! The colours seem good however compared to my TV they still dont compare, however you are paying for the response and refresh times. The Stand is also massive and takes up alot of space, so will be looking for a new stand.
customer_reviews.author: A Miah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. In 2018 its not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: This. Monitor. Is. Amazing. In 2018 its not worth your money. I purchased in October 2017 and at the time there wasnt anything better.
customer_reviews.author: CookiiM0nster

customer_reviews.title: Epic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this Monitor just over 2 weeks. A few quick points • Great build quality • Amazing picture quality • Truly amazing for gaming But be aware the monitor is very large you will need a large desk or space to use affectively.
customer_reviews.author: ShaZZam

customer_reviews.title: the most amazing product I've ever used - I game
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely and without a doubt, the most amazing product I've ever used - I game, I program and I design on this thing and it is a joy to use. Thought about it for months, took the plunge, no issues and games will never, ever be the same again. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: The Z35P I ordered before this was also terrible, I’ll never purchase anything from ACER brand again
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, I’m going to send mine back, full of problems! The main issue, which I cannot get over it is the bleeding edge issue. You cannot watch a video without noticing it. The Z35P I ordered before this was also terrible, I’ll never purchase anything from ACER brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Superb image quality
customer_reviews.text: Superb image quality. You have 3 Gaming Profiles. You can add to screen custom "Crosshair" for shooters & FPS counter. Goes to 100Hz. Rich Menu. Lot of options. G-SYNC makes the difference and this is why I purchased this Monitor. Previously I was using SAMSUNG s34e790c (3440x1440) 21:9 and I can admit that ACER handles black levels better. Solid package.
customer_reviews.author: GODLIKE 99KINGZ

customer_reviews.title: Expensive maintainance fees
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months use my monitor got damaged by my gf and I sent it for maintenance. Today I just got phone call by Acer. 50 pounds accessment fees in advance, 858 pounds repairing fees are required. And I would like to say is ridiculous. 850 pounds would even be enough to purchase a same new monitor. Yeah I’m willing to pay maintenance fees because its intentionally damaged by my gf but now the fees are even much higher than a brand new one. I have to advice anyone who would like to purchase or already purchased this item, please do not let your monitor get damaged, you will be surprised how ridiculous the maintenance fees would be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
